short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gather keywords, trends, and data from other shops directly on Etsy.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your SEO process and increase efficiency by accessing keywords, search trends, and competitive insights right from your browser.

The eRank Extension seamlessly supports platforms like Etsy, Shopify, Amazon, Printify, TeachersPayTeachers, Goimagine, and more.

🔑 Key Features:

📈 Keyword trends: Identify emerging and hot trends from the Etsy.com homepage. 
🔎 Keyword research: Type keywords in the Etsy search bar to access keyword statistics of the page results.
📋 Keyword lists: Save keywords in a list and add them to your listings in just a few clicks.
🏆 Competitive analysis: Sort your competitors’ listings by the number of sales and views to identify best sellers.
🛍️ Shop analytics: Evaluate the performance of your keywords across your shop and listings. Adapt your keyword strategy for visibility.
🤖 AI Helper: Use the AI-powered Listing Helper to generate optimized titles, tags, and descriptions.

🛡️Privacy & Security
eRank is committed to keep your data secured and your personal information confidential. eRank is a read-only service meaning that eRank doesn’t change any information on your behalf. eRank doesn’t track your online activity while you use the eRank Chrome extension. 

For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy: https://help.erank.com/legal/privacy-policy/. 
Learn more about how the eRank Chrome extension works: https://hc.erank.com/en/articles/7019467-erank-extension-installed.
